arts.ttl: Willian makes history with appearance at Aston Villa
arts.sum: This made Willian the South American player with the most Premier League appearances, overtaking Antonio Valencia, the Ecuadorian, who featured for Wigan Athletic and Manchester United . Nation Matches Willian* Brazil 326 Antonio Valencia Ecuador 325 Pablo Zabaleta Argentina 303 Nolberto Solano Peru 302 Sergio Aguero Argentina 275 Ederson* Brazil 273 Fernandinho Brazil 264 Roberto Firmino Brazil 256 Lucas Leiva Brazil 247 Richarlison* Brazil 240
